name: etl-agent
description: ETL Comparison Agent for Data Sentinel AI

scripts.prestart: node -e "try{require.resolve('msnodesqlv8');}catch(e){console.error('Missing dependency: msnodesqlv8. Run: npm run install:windows-auth');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.predev: node -e "try{require.resolve('msnodesqlv8');}catch(e){console.error('Missing dependency: msnodesqlv8. Run: npm run install:windows-auth');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "if(process.platform==='win32'){try{require.resolve('msnodesqlv8');console.log('msnodesqlv8 is ready for Windows Authentication.');}catch(e){console.warn('Windows Authentication dependency not installed. Run: npm run install:windows-auth');}}"

author: Data Sentinel AI
